title: Mac DVD Ripper Pro 6.0.1 [MAC OS X]
description:
MADE IN UKRAINE

Mac DVD Ripper Pro 6.0.1 â€“ Copy, backup, and convert your DVDs.

Mac DVDRipper Pro is the DVD backup solution that lets you protect your DVDs from scratches, save your batteries by reading your movies from your hard disk, manage your collection with just a few clicks, time-shift your rental, backup your DVD collection, and much more! Mac DVDRipper Pro allows you to copy all your DVDs on your Mac so you can easily view them without having to spend your battery on spinning you optical drive.

What's new in version 6.0.1:
- Fixed a bug that prevented 'Select With Player' from properly configuring the audio & subtitle tracks.
- Better message when the destination path is invalid.
- Fixed two bugs when scanning some rare DVDs.

MADE IN UKRAINE
